Reviews.Title: dvr gone bad
Reviews.Author: paul kerstoff
Reviews.Content: since I purchased this DVR I have had nothing but trouble,i am on my second one and either one could not make a year without something going wrong with it,the warranty is about to run out and it is broke again, this time channel six is broke and they will not honor my warranty,do not buy this piece of junk.

ProductInfo.Features: BNC Male to Male Coupler Adapter
ProductInfo.Name: Professional 8 Channel Full D1 H.264 Network DVR for Security Camera System: Support iPhone, Andriod, & Blackberry. HDMI & VGA. Real Time Video/Audio Recording, Playback and Network capability. Built In Motion Detection Recording Function with Sensitivity Adjustment. PTZ Control (No Hard Drive Included)
